item.title: Docker Commands
item.description: General Commands docker images docker pull docker create docker ps docker attach 3378689f2069 Ubuntu Image docker pull ubuntu docker run -it ubuntu /bin/bash apt-get update Anaconda Image docker pull continuumio/anaconda3 docker run -it continuumio/anaconda3 /bin/bash Set up gui: https://dev.
